Package org.openimaj.demos.video

Copyright (c) 2011, The University of Southampton and the individual contributors.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    QRTrackingDemo
    A demo of ZXing using OpenIMAJ to grab images from the camera
    SlitScanVideoDemo
    Demo showing a slit-scan effect being applied in real-time.
    VideoCaptureFramesExample
    Example showing how the built-in OpenIMAJ fps counter works and how to dipsplay real-time fps.
    VideoColourSIFT
    OpenIMAJ Real-time (ish) SIFT tracking and matching demo
    VideoFeatureExtraction
    Demonstration of different feature extraction techniques that produce a single global histogram for a given image.
    VideoMiniatureFakingDemo
    Real-time miniature faking.
    VideoProcessingDemo
    A demo of the video functions and video processing functions in OpenIMAJ.
    VideoShotDetectorVisualisation
    Demonstration of the OpenIMAJ HistogramVideoShotDetector and visualisation thereof.
    VideoSIFT
    OpenIMAJ Real-time (ish) SIFT tracking and matching demo
